This page provides a comprehensive collection of resources on datasets that can be used for statistical analysis, machine learning, and data journalism. The page includes curated collections of free and open data sources, industry-specific data, and multiple public data sources.

## Working with Data

1)  [Data Literacy](https://dataliteracy.com/)
2)  [Using Data Appropriately](https://data.org/guides-resources/)
3)  [Sharing Data](https://posit.co/blog/how-i-use-stories-to-share-data-at-meetings/)
4)  [WTF CSV Data Organization](https://databasic.io/en/wtfcsv/)
5)  [Data Cleaning](https://cghlewis.com/categories/tutorials/)
